content:
# The attempt to craft an Assembling Machine 1 failed because I do not have enough iron plates in my inventory; I only have 1 iron plate available.

# To proceed, I need to smelt more iron ore into iron plates. Since I still have 4 units of iron ore in the new stone furnace, I can continue using that furnace to produce more iron plates.

# I will wait for the new furnace to finish smelting the remaining iron ore into plates. After that, I can extract the plates and check my inventory again.

# Let's monitor the new furnace for the completion of the smelting process.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait
    if inspect_inventory(new_furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] > 0:  # Check if any plates have been produced
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# Once the plates are ready, I can extract them.
crafted_plates = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, new_furnace.position, quantity=4)  # Extract the iron plates
print(f"Extracted Iron Plates: {crafted_plates}")
print(f"Final Furnace status: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the furnace status after extraction
print(f"Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Confirm total iron plates in the inventory
